House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04605
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR AN ADDITIONAL PENALTY TO THE PENAL PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10606, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE UNIVERSAL HEALTH CARE LAW, THE AMENDATORY LAW TO REPUBLIC ACT NOS. 7875 AND 9241, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSE
SHORT TITLE : Strengthening The Mandatory Philhealth Coverage By Adding A Penalty On The Refusal/failure To Register /enroll By Employers In The Private Sector Of Their Employees To National Health Insurance Program

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
